text: Okanye nicinga ukuba niza kungena ePaladesi ningakhanga nivavanywe ngocikido olufana nolo lwabo banandulelayo na? Bathwaxwa ngobuhlwempu obukhulu nezigulo, bacikideka kangangokuba nomProfeti ndawonye nabo babekholwa kunye naye bathi, “Kazi luya kufika nini na uncedo luka- Allâh”! Ewe! Nangoku, uncedo luka-Allâh lukufuphi
